about_the_game:
HolyZone: Strategy and Survival in a Deserted World
HolyZone is a strategy and survival game set in a world turned into a desert by nuclear wars. Gather scarce resources, manage your team of workers, engineers, and soldiers, build makeshift structures, and engage in strategic battles against other towns.


BUILD AND MANAGE YOUR CITY

HolyZone takes place in a world turned into a desert after nuclear wars. In this harsh environment of perpetual daylight, you must build and manage your town to survive. Gather scarce resources, manage your team of workers, engineers, and soldiers, and engage in strategic battles against other towns. Every decision you make will determine the fate of your people.


SHAPE THE FUTURE

In critical moments, do not hesitate to make bold decisions that will shape the future of your people. Will you rule your town with an iron fist, or will you instill mercy and trust? Choose your leadership style, but remember: every decision is irreversible and will change the destiny of your town.


MAKE STRATEGIC DECISIONS

Solve your town's problems and create new opportunities by making strategic decisions. Even seemingly small decisions can lead to significant outcomes. Your people trust you, but their loyalty is not endless. Leadership comes with great responsibility.


TECHNOLOGICAL ADVANCEMENT

Invest in technological advancements to survive. Strengthen your town's infrastructure. Overcome existing challenges and secure the future through continuous progress.


EXPLORE THE DESERT

While your main focus is your town, exploring the outside world is crucial. Expeditions can provide valuable information and materials, and even increase your town's population. There might be other survivors out there, and their fate could be in your hands.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660, Radeon R7 370, or similar with 2 GB of video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Make sure your operating system and graphics card drivers are up to date.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 970, Radeon RX 580 or equivalent with 4GB of video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Make sure your operating system and graphics card drivers are up to date.
